title: Compensation and mileage of electors, amounts
context: ยง14-31 Compensation and mileage of electors, amounts. Each presidential elector shall receive $50 for the elector&rsquo;s services, plus the reasonable cost of transportation from the elector&rsquo;s voting residence in the State to the state capital and return. Their accounts shall be certified to by the chief election officer and audited by the state comptroller, and shall be payable out of the general fund. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
